content: Hey everyone, is the library open late this weekend for exam prep?
Yeah, I heard it's open until midnight on both Saturday and Sunday.
ðŸ“¢ Heads up, everyone! Our first workshop on 'Intro to Next.js 15' is scheduled for next Friday. Sign-up link will be posted soon!
Looking for volunteers for the upcoming cultural fest! DM me if you're interested in helping out with stage management.
A reminder to all third-year students: your project proposals are due by the end of this week.
Hey Kavish, did you manage to solve that tricky DSA problem from yesterday's lecture?
Not yet, I'm still stuck on the recursion part. Want to work on it together in the library later?
Sounds good! See you there around 4 PM.
